role.descr: dominant cell morphology value (if a plus sign is present, this is the left-side value)
non-dominant cell morphology value (if a plus sign is present, this is the right-side value)
final score (if a single value is present)

example.name: with other staging systems
example.text: Gleason 5 + 5 , pT3b , N0 , MX , R0 adenocarcinoma of the prostate
example.amr: (d / disease-disorder :name (n / name :op1 "adenocarcinoma") :mod (r / residual-tumor-91 :ARG2 "R0") :ARG1-of (a2 / ajcc-entity-91 :ARG3 (t / tumor-stage-entity :value "pT3b") :ARG4 (l / lymph-stage-entity :value "N0") :ARG5 (m / mets-stage-entity :value "MX")) :ARG1-of (g / gleason-entity-91 :ARG2 5 :ARG3 5) :location (a / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "prostate")))
